meanings.sent1: The talented diva captivated the audience with her beautiful voice.
meanings.sent2: The diva performed a stunning aria at the opera house.
meanings.sent3: The diva refused to sing until she had her favorite tea backstage.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared like a diva's over the orchestra, filling the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The diva's performance was so powerful that it brought tears to the eyes of the listeners.

meanings.definition: A woman regarded as temperamental or haughty.
meanings.sent1: The diva demanded only green M&M's in her dressing room, showing her haughty attitude.
meanings.sent2: She acted like a diva, throwing a tantrum when things didn't go her way.
meanings.sent3: The diva insisted on having her own personal fan to cool her down during rehearsals.
meanings.sent4: Her behavior at the party was so diva-like, everyone was talking about it the next day.
meanings.sent5: She strutted around the office like a diva, expecting everyone to cater to her every whim.
